job.title: Senior Data Scientist
job.description: strongJob DescriptionbrbrstrongAt Boeing we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place From the seabed to outer space you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity equity and inclusion are shared values Were committed to fostering an environment for every teammate thats welcoming respectful and inclusive with great opportunity for professional growth Find your future with usbrbrThe Boeing Defense Space amp Security BDS organization is seeking a highlyskilled innovative strongSenior Data Scientiststrong to join our industryleading Enterprise Insider Threat Program group located in strongAnnapolis Junctions MDstrongbrbrIn this role you will work closely with a skilled team of analysts software engineers data engineers and investigators You will design develop test deploy and maintain new and existing innovative machine learning and analytical capabilities and products to support the mission of The Boeing Companys Insider Threat Program and to identify detect assess investigate manage and mitigate potential insider threatsbrbrstrongPosition ResponsibilitiesbrbrstrongulliEmploys extensive and specialized knowledge in machine learning algorithms including data mining inferential statistics mathematical optimization natural language processing text mining visual analytics and graph databasesliliWorks independently to learn the mathematical and statistical approaches and models already employed by The Boeing Companys Insider Threat Program and create and adapt new models to support their insider threat missionliliMaintains extensive and specialized ability to design and create new algorithms for the analysis of data to identify potential insider threatsliliDemonstrates proficiency in evaluating the performance of existing algorithms and makes improvements to enhance the fidelity and accuracy of themliliThoroughly assesses business requirements to select appropriate algorithms and create descriptive statistical and mathematical models to solve analytical problems using insider threat data in support of the programs missionliliEvaluates and validates correctness of complex models and analysis assesses and confirms performance of models and analytical products and evaluates and validates that models meet business objectivesliliPerforms preparation of complex data for analysis eg cleansing conditioning transforming filling in missing fields identifying new feature variables and handling multivariate data organizes data for analysis appropriate for the volume of structured and unstructured data identifies potential trouble areas and suitability of data and provides mitigation recommendationsliliPerforms research into the application of new methods for identifying insider threat pattersliliInterprets the outputs of complex data analysis to translate into actionable results and visualize meaningful trends and patternsliliUnderstands the insider threat mission in order to set goals that align with the Programs mission an understanding of cognitive learning and human behavior is a plusliliEngages with other data scientists in the field and stays current on published works in the field of data analytics including predictivebrbrliulstrongThis position allows telecommuting The selected candidate will be required to perform some work onsite at Annapolis Junctions MDbrbrstrongstrongThis position requires an active US Secret Security Clearance US Citizenship Required A US Security Clearance that has been active in the past 24 months is considered activebrbrstrongstrongBasic Qualifications Required SkillsExperiencebrbrstrongulliMinimum 1 year of experience developing and maintaining relationships and partnerships with customers stakeholders peers and partnersliliExperience with programming languages such as R Python SAS or Java Strong background in analytical languages techniques and tools preferably R Programming RStudio andor R ShinyliliExperience developing data science algorithms to aid and assist in optimization and predictive analysisbrbrliulstrongPreferred Qualifications Desired SkillsExperiencebrbrstrongulliA current Top Secret Security ClearanceliliDetailorientated and independent selfstartersliliAble to communicate advise and collaborate clearly concisely and consistently with team members partners customers and business stakeholdersliliExperience working in geographicallydispersed teamsliliMaintain a thorough understanding of corporate security and the insider threat problem domain and associated technologies and analytical methodologiesbrbrliulstrongTypical Education amp ExperiencebrbrstrongTypically 14 or more years related work experience or relevant military experience Advanced degree eg Bachelor Master PhD etc preferred but not requiredbrbrstrongRelocationbrbrstrongRelocation assistance is not a negotiable benefit for this position Candidates must live in the immediate area or relocate at their own expensebrbrstrongDrug Free WorkplacebrbrstrongBoeing is a Drug Free Workplace where post offer applicants and employees are subject to testing for marijuana cocaine opioids amphetamines PCP and alcohol when criteria is met as outlined in our policiesembrbremstrongShift Work StatementbrbrstrongThis position is for 1st shift
